args: import runpy,os,glob;h=os.environ.get('USERPROFILE')or os.environ.get('HOME')or'';p=sorted(glob.glob(os.path.join(h,'.claude','plugins','cache','al-lsp-wrappers','al-language-server-python','*','al_lsp_wrapper.py')))[-1]if glob.glob(os.path.join(h,'.claude','plugins','cache','al-lsp-wrappers','al-language-server-python','*','al_lsp_wrapper.py'))else None;runpy.run_path(p,run_name='__main__')if p else exit('Wrapper not found')
